= Install from tarballs =
Please see [http://code.google.com/p/monosim/wiki/Build_Monosim#Build_and_install_from_tarballs Build and install from tarballs] section

<br />



= Use binaries =
Can find binaries package in [http://code.google.com/p/monosim/downloads/list Downloads area].
 * *On Linux*
 To launch *GTK user interface* using:
  <div>_to obtain help message_</div>
{{{ 
$ mono monosim-gtk.exe --help
}}}
  <div>_to launch without log_</div>
{{{ 
$ mono monosim-gtk.exe
}}}
  NOTE: _you need to install *gtk-sharp2* and *glade-sharp2* to use it_
----

 To launch *QT user interface* using:
  <div>_to obtain help message_</div>
{{{ 
$ mono monosim-qt.exe --help
}}}
  <div>_to launch without log_</div>
{{{
$ mono monosim-qt.exe
}}}
  NOTE: _you need to install *qyoto* to use it_
----

<br />
 * *On Windows*

 To launch *GTK user interface* simple double click on monosim-gtk.exe <br />
 _*NOTE*_: _you need to install [http://www.go-mono.com/mono-downloads/download.html Gtk# for .NET] to use it_
